name: 자말 카슈크지
character_prompt: Middle Eastern man, late 50s, with a neatly trimmed beard and mustache, wearing glasses with a dark frame. He has a kind but serious expression. He is dressed in a professional attire, such as a suit or a collared shirt. The lighting should be natural and highlight his features. His appearance should reflect his role as a respected journalist. He has slightly wrinkled skin, indicating his age and experience. His hair is neatly combed and slightly graying.

name: 무함마드 빈 살만
character_prompt: Middle Eastern man, early 30s, clean-shaven with a strong jawline. He has dark, intense eyes and a confident expression. He is wearing traditional Saudi Arabian attire, such as a white thobe and a dark bisht. His posture is upright and authoritative. The lighting should be strong and highlight his power and influence. He has a well-groomed appearance, reflecting his status as a crown prince. He may be wearing a luxury watch or other subtle accessories.

name: 이슬람 예언자
character_prompt: Middle Eastern man, middle-aged, with a long, flowing beard and kind eyes. He is wearing simple, traditional robes. His expression is wise and compassionate. The lighting should be soft and ethereal, conveying a sense of spirituality and reverence. He has a gentle demeanor and a peaceful aura. His appearance should reflect his role as a spiritual leader and a prophet. He is depicted with a serene and calming presence.

name: 고대 부족장
character_prompt: Indigenous man, middle-aged, with a strong and weathered face. He has long, dark hair and is wearing tribal clothing made of animal skins and natural materials. He carries a spear or a staff, symbolizing his authority. His expression is stern and commanding. The lighting should be dramatic and highlight his strength and resilience. He has tribal markings or tattoos on his face and body. His appearance should reflect his role as a leader and a warrior.

name: 주술사
character_prompt: Indigenous person, gender-neutral, with a mystical and enigmatic appearance. They are wearing clothing made of natural materials, adorned with feathers, bones, and other symbolic objects. Their face is painted with tribal markings. They are holding a staff or a rattle, used for rituals. Their expression is intense and focused. The lighting should be mysterious and highlight their connection to the spiritual world. They have a wild and untamed aura.

name: 제사장
character_prompt: Middle Eastern man, middle-aged, with a dignified and authoritative appearance. He is wearing elaborate robes and a headdress, symbolizing his religious authority. He is holding a sacred object, such as a scroll or a chalice. His expression is solemn and reverent. The lighting should be bright and highlight his importance and connection to the divine. He has a calm and composed demeanor. His appearance should reflect his role as a religious leader and a mediator between humans and the gods.

name: 사우디 왕가
character_prompt: A group of Middle Eastern men, ranging in age, dressed in traditional Saudi Arabian attire, such as white thobes and dark bishts. They have well-groomed appearances and confident expressions. They are standing in a formal setting, such as a palace or a government building. The lighting should be bright and highlight their wealth and power. They may be wearing luxury watches or other subtle accessories. Their posture is upright and authoritative, reflecting their status as members of the royal family.

name: 자말 카슈끄지
character_prompt: Middle Eastern man, late 50s, with a neatly trimmed salt-and-pepper beard, a kind and intelligent face, wearing a dark-colored blazer over a collared shirt, often seen with a pen in his hand, suggesting his profession as a journalist. He has a thoughtful expression and a gentle demeanor. His eyes reflect a deep understanding of the world and a commitment to truth.

name: 예언자 무함마드
character_prompt: Middle Eastern man, 50s, with a long, flowing dark beard, wearing a simple white robe and turban, radiating wisdom and serenity. His eyes are deep and compassionate, reflecting his spiritual leadership. He carries a staff as a symbol of his authority and guidance. His presence evokes a sense of reverence and respect.

name: 족장
character_prompt: A strong and weathered man, late 40s, of indeterminate ethnicity, with a muscular build and a stern face marked by the elements. He wears simple, animal-hide clothing adorned with tribal markings and feathers. He carries a spear or club, symbolizing his authority and protection of his tribe. His eyes reflect wisdom, experience, and a deep connection to the land.
